works
my method
get magnet link
download
find the torrent folder
open it
run the hypercam setup application
choose where to install to on your comp
install it
wait
finish install then wait for evaluation copy to pop up
go to bottom of screen where it says register
click it
then click  enter license now
enter code from included info file
i entered the single text line at bottom of info file
the first top longer code did not work for me
the bottom one did
then close hypercam
open it again
then go play
